Summary: Very bright light in west/south west, exploded.
divs: sighting details went outside w\ 10x30 canon is binocs to look atsky. too bright for stars, then noticed one very bright planet, but time notright for venus or jupiter.could not quite resolve it to one point of light inbinocs, almost appeared tobe double blobs. observed a few airliners and wentback to the bright object.this object then exploded into so many pieces itappeared to be a galaxy seenedge on. after a few seconds a smaller piece movedfurther south out the theexplosion along the axis of the event. all were nowgetting dimmer, and dissapeared after a few more seconds. all this occurredbefore i could seeany other stars. i have observed jupiter, venus, mars etc inmy 8 inch schmidtand do not believe this was a planet. probably totallyunrelated, but at 9 pmcould make out at f-16 cross the same area at 35-40degrees my location. i hope someone else saw this, because i would sure like toknow what it was.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Falls Church
There were no other sightings in Falls Church on or around July 5th 2002
